dct_title_s: Tabula geographica, in qva omnes regiones, urbes, oppida, loc. et fluvij Israeli√¶ describuntur
dct_alternative_sm: Tabula geographica, in qua omnes regiones, urbes, oppida, loc. et fluvij Israeliae describuntur

Geographische beschryvinge, waer in alle landschappe, steden, plaetsen en rivieren des lands Israels worden beschreve; waer van in Josua, en anderen boecken des Ouden Testaments vermelt wordt van nieus in velen plaetsen verbetert, en met landpalen onderscheyden
dct_description_sm: [Petrus Plancius] ; gedruckt by Jan Evertss Cloppenborch ; Baptista Doetechmius sculp.
Coordinates approximate and based on Greenwich meridian.
Bar scale on map given in "Horae itineris".
Shows topography, drainage, territorial boundaries of the tribes of Israel, places of historical interest.
Features illustrations of a compass rose and ship.

15 pictorial vignettes surrounding map: [1] Josua 10 cap. -- [2] Josua 3 cap. -- [3] 2. Sam. 18 cap. -- [4] 1 Reg. 3 cap. -- [5] 1 Reg. 18 cap. -- [6] Ester 5 -- [7] Daniel 2 cap. -- [8] Daniel 3 cap. -- [9] 1 Sam. 25 cap. -- [10] 1 Sam. 17 cap. -- [11] 1 Sam. 10 cap. -- [12] Judic 14 cap. -- [13] Judic 11 cap. -- [14] Judic 7 cap. -- [15] Judic 6 cap.
